posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I'm looking to buy one to three copies of Lew Lipset's Encyclopedia Vol. 1, 2, & 3.  Old Cardboard apparently does not have any more, and I'm looking to pick up a few as gifts.

For reference, this is what I'm looking for:
[url]https://www.amazon.com/Encyclopedia-Baseball-Cards-Volumes-Combined/dp/B003U8ZHNE[/url]

If you have any new or gently used copies, please let me know.  I'm looking to pay $35 delivered for new/like new copies (which is what Old Cardboard previously sold them for).  I pay with paypal f/f.

Thanks,
Steve
Well that is a nice gesture. I suspect your friends will be coming out of the woodwork to check in. :D
Sometimes actually finding the thing to give is harder than deciding what to give! :eek:

Found one...thank you, Greg! 

Looking for one or two more if anybody has them. 

Cheers, 
Steve
